member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_RUN_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: Contains additional properties related to those in .

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_RUN_DESCRIPTION.localeName
member.summary: An array of characters containing the locale name associated with this run.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_RUN_DESCRIPTION.string
member.summary: An array of characters containing the text associated with the glyphs.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_RUN_DESCRIPTION.stringLength
member.summary: The number of characters in UTF16 code-units. Note that this may be different than the number of glyphs.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_RUN_DESCRIPTION.clusterMap
member.summary: An array of indices to the glyph indices array, of the first glyphs of all the glyph clusters of the glyphs to render.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_RUN_DESCRIPTION.textPosition
member.summary: Corresponding text position in the string this glyph run came from. This is relative to the beginning of the string represented by the object.
